page.title: 13SPORTS DAY--------S.THOMPSON
page.content:
EVERY YEAR OUR SCHOOL,(STANLEY COMMON PRIMARY SCHOOL C OF E) HAS A SPORTS DAY.I PERSONALLY CAN'T STAND IT,BUT MOST PEOPLE LIKE IT.THE WHOLE SHOOL TAKES PART.WE HAVE A FLAT RACE,A SACK RACE,AN EGG AND SPOON RACE AND A SKIPPING RACE.LAST TIME WE HAD A MINI MARATHON,BUT I MANAGED TO GET OUT OF IT. WE HAVE THREE TEAMS;YELLOW,RED AND BLUE THE SAME AS THE TEAM POINTS.THE YELLOW TEAM NEARLY ALWAYS WINS.I AM IN YELLOW. MY FAVOURITE RACE IS THE EGG AND SPOON,BUT MOST PEOPLE PREFER THE FLAT RACE.MUMS AND DADS CAN COME AND ANYONE ELSE. MRS NEWMAN STARTED US OFF LAST TIME.
{CONTINUED ON PAGE 14 {
